Perrier-Jouët master class at Gallery & Co
Friday 17 June
Deepen your appreciation for the art of fine bubbly. Toast the night away with our first master class of the year. Limited seats are available for these two sessions:
Session 1 - 6.30pm to 8pm
Session 2 - 8.30pm to 10pm
After the master class, join us at the outdoor bar for the Gallery & Co Block Party for a night of dancing under the stars with the majestic city view as your backdrop. You will also stand a chance to win a Perrier-Jouët Grand Brut Magnum at the party!
Get your tickets here <[[http://pjmasterclass.peatix.com/]]>
So much to look forward to
Singapore’s longest champagne brunch at Gallery & Co
Sunday 5 June 2016,
11am to 6pm
Not your average Brunch Party when there's a Perrier-Jouët
pop-up bar. Chill and relax as you enjoy this ultra extended brunch.
Learn More <[[https://www.facebook.com/events/285312518468675/]]>
Welcome the return of the Sky High Brunch at CÉ LA VI
Saturday 4 June 2016, 12pm till 4pm
Limitless skyline view, endless Perrier-Jouët Grand Brut champagne, and a verible feast with fresh oysters and petit fours.
Book a table now <[[http://sg.celavi.com/shop/]]>
